name: Make a Path for the Chicken
name_original: Make a Path for the Chicken
description:
Accidentally this Chicken fell into a cave and found herself separated from her chicks. The player's mission is to help her find the best way to get back safely to the surface and rejoin her family.





- Click on the floating pieces to rotate them.

- The chicken jumps are short, so you need to figure out the right position for each piece.

- Don't worry, there is no timer in the game and you can solve each level challenge in your own time.

- The game automatically saves at the beginning of a new level.
